synopsis.text: Nobita and his friends embark on an exciting summer adventure to explore the uncharted depths of an African jungle, guided by research and accompanied by a lost white dog named Peko. As they journey deeper, they uncover a mysterious connection between Peko and their destination. This anime is a remake of the 1982 film "Doraemon: Nobita's Great Demon," penned by Fujiko F. Fujio, the original co-creator of Doraemon. Prepare for a thrilling and enigmatic expedition with Nobita and his friends in this fresh take on a classic tale.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
